Title: Relates to employee petitions to participate in a shared work program and to employer responses to such petitions
Summary: Relates to employee petitions to participate in a shared work program and to employer responses to such petitions; requires such petitions to be submitted to the commissioner of labor and to be made available for public access on the department of labor website.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the labor law, in relation to employee petitions to participate in a shared work program and employer responses to such petitions
